Items: Friendly, well-liked by locals
Grim, warning the party of the diseases afoot
Scared, timid of the owner
Brave, willing to try anything once
Snooty, claims to have higher-class clientele
Cocky, not afraid to get dirty
Surly, still mad about the customer before you
Humble, but probably for good reason
generally bored, hard to interest
annoyed, dissmissive in nature
serene, very contemplative in thought
careful, very purposeful in action
trusting, willing to follow a good plan
sceptical, quick to distrust
deceitful, prone to constant lying
apprehensive, slow to trust
jumpy, quick to make knee-jerk reactions
honest, forthcoming in knowledge
secretive, tight-lipped about what goes on here
overconfident, like to brag
hard working, valuing those with a similar mindset
optimistic, can envision the best possible outcome
enthusiastic, ready for anything
gloomy, unable to see the bright side of a situation
cold, calculated in action
cruel, filled with sharp insults when they speak
jittery, unwilling to commit to most actions
grumpy, fed up with people in general
inconsiderate, downright rude at times
indecisive, constantly wavering between available options
pretentious, noticably vain
miserly, trying to upsell everything possible
lazy, trying to escape having to actually DO anything physical
unsympathetic, distain the clients
selfish, and doesn't mind being rude in the process
rebellious, eager to buck the system
